title: Avlee Greek Kitchen
typeOfFood: Lacto, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Rustic Greek cuisine with veggie dishes marked on the menu, including cold spreads, sides, salads, soups, and grill platters. Besides the familiar moussaka or Greek salad, there is pur√©ed eggplant, barley salad, herbed white beans, lentils and artichokes. The narrow storefront has an open kitchen and a  casual atmosphere with quick service.
